ai-patthana15.13:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.13:1.1_0: Because of a limited thought, the support is not a cause.
ai-patthana15.13:2.1_0: Because of the expansive principle, not the support for the thought that arises.
ai-patthana15.13:3.1_0: Because of the support for the teaching, the support is not the cause or condition for the support.
ai-patthana15.13:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
